util

Class WeightedMultiHashMap<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.MultiMap<K,V>
      • util.MultiHashMap<K,V>
        • util.WeightedMultiHashMap<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The key type.

    public final class WeightedMultiHashMap<K,V>
extends MultiHashMap<K,V>
    Extends the MultiHashMap with the ability to weight values.

    Adds functionality to permit random picking from the image of a key based on these weights. Each value in an image has its own separate weight. This means that the weight of (k1,v1) is not necessarily equal to the weight of (k2,v1). Values with unspecified weight are assumed to have a weight of 1.

    Author:
    Bitidork

      • get

        public java.util.Set<V> get(K k)
        Description copied from class: MultiMap
        Gets the value of k under this multimap, or null if the key is not in its domain.

        This set is directly modifiable. Behavior when MultiMap.removeAll(Object) or the set is used and becomes empty is undefined.

        Overrides:
        get in class MultiHashMap<K,V>
        Parameters:
        k - The key.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of k under this multimap, or null if the key is not in its domain.

      • pickRandom

        public V pickRandom(K k,
           java.util.Random rand)
        Picks a random value from the value of k under this mapping biased by their weights.
        Parameters:
        k - The key to pick a value from.
        rand - The random number generator to use.
        Returns:
        Returns the random value picked, or null if no value could be picked. This occurs either when the image is empty or the key has no weight.

      • pickRandom

        public V pickRandom(K k)
        Picks a random value from the value of k under this mapping biased by their weights.

        Uses the thread's local random number generator.

        Parameters:
        k - The key to pick a value from.
        Returns:
        Returns the random value picked, or null if no value could be picked.
        See Also:
        ThreadLocalRandom
